user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I want to make it environmentally friendly. Can you recommend sustainable venues and transportation options for attendees? Also, provide me with the carbon footprint of the event and suggest eco-friendly catering services.

TaskList.description: Research and list sustainable venues suitable for corporate events in the desired location.
Find environmentally friendly transportation options for the attendees to the event venue.
Calculate the estimated carbon footprint of the event based on the venue, transportation, and catering options.
Identify eco-friendly catering services that align with sustainability goals for the event.
